2.0 CONNECT PRESSURE PUMP TO DCW RING MAINS
Conformance Criteria - 1. Air should be removed at each building prior to the DCW water supply water entry assembly to prevent debris from entering building.

Combined Services - Fire Inground Ring Main Pipework
template name: Combined Services - Fire Inground Ring Main Pipework

name: Referenced Documentation - RDM Tracker Consent Tracker
Conformance Criteria - RDM approval tracker Consent approval tracker
Records - Receipt of Approval by Client
Conformance Criteria - For all materials, a certificate of compliance shall be provided to the Client Rep. before the materials are incorporated into the works.
2.0 CONNECT PRESSURE PUMP TO DCW RING MAINS
2.1 - Accept delivery of pump to site
Conformance Criteria - 1. Check pump is rated for pressure test
2. Check all supplied attachments are correct and in good order
3. Check fluid levels & fill as necessary
2.2 - Connect pump to Fire ring mains
Conformance Criteria - Confirm connections are safe and correct
2.3 - Connect calibrated gauges for pressure test
Conformance Criteria - Confirm position is correct, gauge is in good order for test & calibrated
3.1 - Fill Fire ring mains with domestic water
Conformance Criteria - Completely fill closed loop system with water releasing all air from the Valves at each Building
Frequency - Every time system is opened
3.2 - Gradually increase system pressure to 15.5 Bar
Conformance Criteria - Slowly raise system pressure to 15.5 Bar
• Checking for any signs of leaks or pressure drops
Conformance Criteria - Record START time & photograph gauge
• All relevant parties to witness starting pressure of 15.5 Bar
Conformance Criteria - Record FINISH time & photograph gauge
• All relevant parties to witness pressure of 15.5 Bar
3.5 - Pressure released or reduced for next test
Conformance Criteria - Supervisor to ensure energy (pressure) is only stored while under test
3.6 - Discharge pressure leave system in a safe state
Conformance Criteria - Discharge system pressure, ensure area is left in a safe state meeting site requirement
Conformance Criteria - All pipework pressure test reports shall be provided
